Key Match Events: Youssef Msakni scored a late penalty to hand Patrick Mabedi, his first home defeat as the Malawi National Football Team was beaten 1-0 by Tunisia
Pre-Game Insights: Patrick Mabedi made only a single change to the side that defeated Liberia 1-0 in Monrovia on Friday by handing Wisdom Mpinganjira his first start
Post-Match Reflections: The Flames are third in the standings with three points
